title: Comet Wierzchos buzzes the sun later today: But can you see it?
description: C/2024 E1 (Wierzchos) brightened significantly ahead of its close approach to the sun.
content: C/2024 E1 (Wierzchos) brightened significantly ahead of its close approach to the sun.
